summary: this mod basically gives you a new set of lore friendly light armor designed for hunter/ranger characters.
descriptionHtml:
here is it, after so many problems, my first work and also my first mod ever (hopefully the first of a long serie :D).


DESCRIPTION
this mod gives you a new craftable and upgradable set of light armor that you can find under the leather section.
the set is composed by:
- hunter armor
- hunter armor without rabbits
- hunter boots
- hunter gloves
i did not like any of the helmet/hood solutions i've tried during the making process so i did not add any of them, you choose what to wear :D


and if you want a more immersive roleplaying experience just download the "hunting in skyrim" mod by B1gBadDaddy link to the mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18866

also remember to download a great mod by my friend laup26 that gives you a new saddle wich inspired by the theme of the nordic hunter armor, it is perfect if you go hunt on your horse and you want to make it look epic! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19936

IF YOU ARE HAVING PROBLEMS GETTING THE PROPER DEER HIDE TO CRAFT THE ARMOR HERE IS THE CONSOLE COMMAND FOR THEM:
player.additem 3AD90 2

VIDEOS
[youtube]xYNB8UEDdNU[/youtube] [youtube]g3A-suWQ_uY[/youtube]
[youtube]DWzWAihl9GU[/youtube] [youtube]hYNBktsmyZc[/youtube]

THINGS TO DO
- fix some littlem problems on the female version, possibly add some other particulars

CHANGELOG
v1.2.1:fixed a problem going on on the male version consisting in a gap between the knee and the foot
v1.2: added the first version of the female armor, minor tweaks on the textures
v1.1: fixed the little problem that cause the boots going down in the crafting list

INSTALLATION
just put the files you find in the archive into your skyrim data folder.

CREDITS
-the torso of the armor comes from the iorveth armor from "the witcher 2" game developed by CD Projekt: credit goes to CD Projekt to wich the meshes and textures belong, LordOfWar for porting it into skyrim and to Hucifer for making the standalone iorveth set (be sure to check their awesome mods the witcher 2 models by lordofwar: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5588 iorveth's light armor by hucifer:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5644)
-the necloth used in the armor comes from bluestripes commando heavy armor from "the witcher 2" developed by CD Projekt: credit goes to CD projekt to wich textures and meshes belong and to TH3WICK3D1 for porting the armor into skyrim (great armors in his mod be sure to check them: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7807)
-the pants assets come from the Einherjar Armor by Omesean, credits go to him and check his awesome work: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12693
-the base texture for the rabbits was taken from the hanging rabbits retexture by valius (very detailfull texture check it: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1780)
-credits go also to bethesda game studios for the skyrim's assets, meshes and textures and for had given us such a great amount of awesomeness

SPECIAL THANKS
i wanna thank TacticalAce for helping me testing the armor assets he was very kind! thumbs up for him :D
a real big thank you goes to two great modders but first of all two great persons like Omesean and Natterforme, thanks to them i passed from being a complete noob to release my first work in at least 2 months! they were always ready to help me and support me, to them goes all my respect and gratitude! thank you guys for your kindness and patience!

PERMISSIONS:
if you want to use this armor in some other of your mods just pm me and i will give you permission, i'm happy to help the community as the community helped me.
author: frankdema
